name: Hazelnut and Fresh Brussels Sprout Salad
author: parker
summary: This is a salad with fresh hazelnuts, either roasted or not, with raw, shredded, and very fresh Brussels sprouts.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds Brussels sprouts, finely shredded
2 pinches salt, or more to taste
2 ounces crumbled blue cheese, or more to taste
directions: Remove about 1/4 the Brussels sprouts and thinly cut cross-wise with a knife; add back to the remaining shredded Brussels sprouts
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, lime juice, chives, thyme, and salt together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; set aside for flavors to blend, about 5 minutes
Toss Brussels sprouts and hazelnuts together in a large bowl
Drizzle dressing over Brussels sprouts mixture; lightly toss to coat
Add blue cheese; toss to coat
